verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> and <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah<s%>. <S%H1419>Great<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> to be <S%H1984>praised<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>, in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of his <S%H6944>holiness<s%>. for: or, of

<S%H3303>Beautiful<s%> for <S%H5131>situation<s%>, the <S%H4885>joy<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth<s%>, is <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, on the <S%H3411>sides<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%>, the <S%H7151>city<s%> of the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%>.
For, lo, the <S%H4428>kings<s%> were <S%H3259>assembled<s%>, they passed <S%H5674>by<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.
They <S%H7200>saw<s%> it, and so they <S%H8539>marvelled<s%>; they were <S%H926>troubled<s%>, and hasted <S%H2648>away<s%>.
<S%H7461>Fear<s%> took <S%H270>hold<s%> upon them there, and <S%H2427>pain<s%>, as of a woman in <S%H3205>travail<s%>.

As we have <S%H8085>heard<s%>, so have we <S%H7200>seen<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>: <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H3559>establish<s%> it <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
We have <S%H1819>thought<s%> of thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thy <S%H1964>temple<s%>.

According to thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, so is thy <S%H8416>praise<s%> unto the <S%H7099>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>: thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>.
Let <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%>, let the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> be <S%H1523>glad<s%>, because of thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%>.
Walk <S%H5437>about<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, and go round <S%H5362>about<s%> her: <S%H5608>tell<s%> the <S%H4026>towers<s%> thereof.

<S%H7896>Mark<s%> ye <S%H3820>well<s%> her <S%H2430>bulwarks<s%>, <S%H6448>consider<s%> her <S%H759>palaces<s%>; that ye may <S%H5608>tell<s%> it to the <S%H1755>generation<s%> <S%H314>following<s%>. Mark: Heb. Set your heart to consider: or, raise up
For this <S%H430>God<s%> is our <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever<s%>: he will be our <S%H5090>guide<s%> even unto <S%H4192>death<s%>.
